name: RTCRtpSender.dtmf
description: The read-only dtmf property on the RTCRtpSender interface returns a RTCDTMFSender object which can be used to send DTMF tones over the RTCPeerConnection. See Using DTMF for details on how to make use of the returned RTCDTMFSender object.
content: The read-only dtmf property on the RTCRtpSender interface returns a RTCDTMFSender object which can be used to send DTMF tones over the RTCPeerConnection . See Using DTMF for details on how to make use of the returned RTCDTMFSender object.
